name: webui
description: A chat interface for analyzing Telegram channel messages using AI.

notes.about: This package.json is for the frontend 'webui' only. It is marked private to avoid accidental publishing. JSON does not support comments, so this object documents fields for developers.
notes.scripts: dev: vite dev server (HMR) for development; build: produce production assets (point FastAPI to serve them); preview: locally serve built files; tsc:build: optional TypeScript compile.
notes.usage: Run 'npm install' in the webui folder, then 'npm run dev' for development or 'npm run build' to create static files for FastAPI.
notes.note: Remove or ignore this object if you plan to publish the package, although 'private: true' prevents publishing by default.
